item.description:
Here's our second trip.
It has been slated for you all to be there, in Merrimac NH, for 8:30 a.m.
Might want to leave from KFIT at 7:30. Directions will follow on a sep email.

I'm signing up the ones that couldn't make it the last time. Leaves only a few slots available. Please RSVP accordingly.

You need to be a US Citizen and have a photo ID at the time of arrival. Mass drivers license works the best.

RSVP as a maybe would put you on the list only as an alternate in the case of a last minute change (happens all the time)

I'll need to know soon,

Charley and Bob A

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: TRACON TRIP # 2
